attributes.action: Allow working tax credits to be received by people under 25 with a low income even if they don't have children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am in the under 25 age group an receive a low wage as i only work part time, however, when I looked up the Tax Credits website I found that someone in my age group can only get help with expenses if they have kids whereas if I was over 25 I wouldnt need to. This is just one of many factors which encourages young girls to have kids they cant look after. It feels like I'm being punished for being sensible.
